data.name: Net Friend Joy Joypad Demo
data.detailed_description:
Attention

Disable Steam input and test.
Steam input is not available in the retail version. (by Steam specifications )

You use 2button, pov and keftstick.
If retro games, you can play it with this tool.
Please, you use this demo and check if your Gamepad is available.
